title: Sanity - Activity Overview
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive analysis of the content and project-related activities for your Sanity projects.

definition.content:
[Sanity](https://www.sanity.io/) is a headless content management system (CMS) designed for building flexible, real-time websites and applications. It enables developers and content teams to efficiently manage structured content across multiple platforms.

This dashboard provides a comprehensive analysis of the content and project-related activities for your Sanity projects.

For more information, see the [Sanity Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/sanity/).

**Tip**:
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.
